title: Frozen Land
writer: Paavo Westerberg (screenplay), Jari Rantala (screenplay), Aku Louhimies (screenplay)
actors: Jasper Pääkkönen, Mikko Leppilampi, Pamela Tola, Petteri Summanen
plot: When a schoolteacher is sacked he projects his bad mood at his troubled teen son. He in turn buys a CD player from a pawnshop with counterfeit money. This causes a chain-reaction that wreaks havoc on many lives, as everyone transfers their problems to the next victim.
